title: The Chronicles of Riddick: Dark Fury (2004) PAL
description:
The Chronicles of Riddick: Dark Fury (2004)
-------------------------------------------
"Extend the Pitch Black experience with this all-new animated film that bridges the stories of &#039;Pitch Black&#039; and &#039;The Chronicles of Riddick&#039;."

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0407658/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0407658/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Icelandic, Dutch, Portuguese, English, Turkish, Croatian, Russian, Arabic

Extra Materials:
- Creating Dark Fury.
- Dark Fury Animated.
- Peter Chung: Inside the Brain of the Animator.
- A Look Into the Light.
- "Van Helsing" Animated Trailer.
- "Vivendi" Game Trailer.


Plot outline:
This story opens with the new action hero and the two other survivors of Pitch Black already caught by a giant spaceship filled with dread. The sinewy leader has a unique--and creepy--jail for master villains and she has her sights set on Riddick. And Jack as they cross paths with a ship of body hunters and are brought on board. The captain of the ship, Chillingsworth has an interesting hobby - she captures wanted criminals and makes living statues of them.
